docstring.long_description:
The large array must be passed to the bottom "array" connection.

For ordered pair, the single point must have a shape of 1 (or (1,)).
docstring.short_description: Append a single data point to an array.

parameters.name: primary_dp
parameters.description: Input that ends up "on top" of the resulting DataContainer.

parameters.name: secondary_dp
parameters.description: Input that ends up "on the bottom" of the resulting DataContainer.
